issue.title: Basket does not validate the third party details fields if existing
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Basket does not validate the third party details fields if existing

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

rev. 9268
